statements: INSERT INTO Customers (id, name, email, phone_number, address) VALUES (1, 'John Doe', 'johndoe@example.com', '1234567890', '123 Main Street') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = excluded.name, email = excluded.email, phone_number = excluded.phone_number, address = excluded.address

INSERT INTO Customers (id, name, email, phone_number, address) VALUES (2, 'Jane Smith', 'janesmith@example.com', '9876543210', '456 Elm Street') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = excluded.name, email = excluded.email, phone_number = excluded.phone_number, address = excluded.address

INSERT INTO Customers (id, name, email, phone_number, address) VALUES (3, 'Michael Johnson', 'michaeljohnson@example.com', '5555555555', '789 Oak Avenue') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = excluded.name, email = excluded.email, phone_number = excluded.phone_number, address = excluded.address

UPSERT INTO customers (id, name, email, phone, address) VALUES (1, 'John Doe', 'johndoe@example.com', '1234567890', '123 Main St') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = 'John Doe', email = 'johndoe@example.com', phone = '1234567890', address = '123 Main St';

UPSERT INTO orders (order_id, customer_id, order_date, order_total) VALUES (1, 1, '2022-01-01', 100.00) ON CONFLICT (order_id) DO UPDATE SET customer_id = 1, order_date = '2022-01-01', order_total = 100.00;

UPSERT INTO customers (id, name, email, phone, address) VALUES (2, 'Jane Smith', 'janesmith@example.com', '9876543210', '456 Elm St') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = 'Jane Smith', email = 'janesmith@example.com', phone = '9876543210', address = '456 Elm St';

UPSERT INTO customers (customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number) VALUES (1, 'John Doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '1234567890') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE customer_name = VALUES(customer_name), email = VALUES(email), phone_number = VALUES(phone_number);
UPSERT INTO orders (order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount) VALUES (1, 1, '2022-01-01', 100.50) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE order_date = VALUES(order_date), total_amount = VALUES(total_amount);
UPSERT INTO products (product_id, product_name, price) VALUES (1, 'Product 1', 50.25) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE product_name = VALUES(product_name), price = VALUES(price);

INSERT INTO customers (customer_name, email, phone_number, address) VALUES ('John Doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '1234567890', '123 Main St') ON CONFLICT (customer_name) DO UPDATE SET email = EXCLUDED.email, phone_number = EXCLUDED.phone_number, address = EXCLUDED.address;

INSERT INTO orders (customer_id, order_date, total_amount, status) VALUES (1, '2022-01-01', 100.00, 'Pending') ON CONFLICT (customer_id, order_date) DO UPDATE SET total_amount = EXCLUDED.total_amount, status = EXCLUDED.status;

INSERT INTO contacts (customer_id, contact_name, contact_email, contact_phone) VALUES (1, 'Jane Smith', 'jane.smith@example.com', '9876543210') ON CONFLICT (customer_id, contact_name) DO UPDATE SET contact_email = EXCLUDED.contact_email, contact_phone = EXCLUDED.contact_phone;
